string.value: Moppie's master, Huckle, wants to ask me for another favor...now what?
Huckle has little to no time outside his studies, and wanted me to get Moppie some fish again, and this time, he wants me to gather up 300 of them! \n\n#t4000088# #b#c4000088#/300#k
I gathered up 300 of Jr. Pepe's Fishes and got them to Moppie as a favor from Huckle, but...
Aren't you the one that wanted to be my assistant? Did Moppie like the fishes? Did you tell him I sent for it? ...Really? Moppie liked them that much??
Alright! Moppie should be fed more with stuff he likes. Can you gather up 300 this time? I may hire you as my assistant if this goes well.

Thank you! I may even put your name in one of the studies I have conducted over the years. Make sure to pick up the fishes that the Jr. Pepes drop at the bottom of Orbis Tower. 300 fishes for Moppie! \n\n#i4000088# #t4000088# #b300#k
Right now ... I am so busy with this work that I can't do anything else in my life.
Fish again? Did my master send for it again? I just wish he stops working so hard on his research ... bark, I understand that he wants to take care of me, but ...
Yuck, that smell of fish. My master may not like to hear what I'm about to say, but ... I'm sick of it!! Bark! Please don't bring fish again, bark ... please ... bark bark!
Anyway, thanks for the great news, bark! You really do love all animals, bark!
Hey, is that all the fishes you have?
